amendment.description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute sought to limit takings claims to those involving the Federal government and eliminate language dealing with local zoning matters.
amendment.purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute numbered 3 printed in House Report 106-525 to eliminate section 2 of the bill and retains Sections 3 and 4 of the bill which seek to expedite takings cases in which federal (as opposed to local) actions are at issue.

action.text: Amendment (A003) in the nature of a substitute offered by Mr. Boehlert.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Boehlert amendment (A003) Failed by recorded vote: 179 - 234 (Roll no. 53).
